mapper.sql: id, `name`, image, user_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, `number`, amount, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into shopping_cart (id, `name`, image, user_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, `number`, amount, create_time) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.dishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.setmealId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.dishFlavor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
